text: Ramon Flanigan is a former American football player and coach. He currently serves as the director of former player relations at Southern Methodist University in Dallas, Texas. Flanigan served as the head football coach at Lincoln University in Chester County, Pennsylvania from 2013 to 2014. As a college football player, he was a quarterback at SMU. ==References== Category:Year of birth missing (living people) Category:Living people Category:American football quarterbacks Category:SMU Mustangs football players Category:Lamar Cardinals football coaches Category:Lincoln Lions football coaches Category:North Texas Mean Green football coaches Category:Mississippi Valley State Delta Devils football coaches
title: Ramon Flanigan
